ğŸ‰ ğ—œğ—»ğ˜ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—±ğ˜‚ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´: ğ—¦ğ—®ğ—¹ğ—²ğ˜€ğ—¥ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—¸ - ğ—®ğ—» ğ—¼ğ—³ğ—³ğ—¶ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—¥ğ—²ğ—®ğ—½ğ—¶ğ˜ ğ—”ğ—½ğ—½ğ— ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¸ğ—²ğ˜ ğ—£ğ—®ğ—¿ğ˜ğ—»ğ—²ğ—¿ ğŸ‰

SalesRook brings the messages you exchange with customers on your WhatsApp into Reapit AgencyCloud  - the UK's #1 property CRM - sharing your progress and valuable intel with your team.

This legitimises instant messaging as a highly-effective, 1-to-1 direct customer relationship channel so you can:

âš¡ï¸  Sell more whilst saving time
âš¡ï¸  Feel secure on GDPR, and
âš¡ï¸  Build business intelligence in seconds

SalesRook works on the browser version of the WhatsApp web app and enables Sales, Lettings, Renewals, Customer Service and Support teams to communicate with customers whilst automatically syncing with Reapit for cross-team collaboration, governance and oversight.

Negotiators can use their individual work phone number and their own first/last name as a display name on WhatsApp - just like they do on professional email.

They can also participate in WhatsApp group chats, build a one-to-one human relationship with the customer, and follow up without restriction to close the deal - all whilst using a desktop interface paired with their work phone or mobile device.

With ğ——ğ˜†ğ—»ğ—®ğ—ºğ—¶ğ—° ğ—£ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—³ğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—²ğ˜€, agents can view customer details in real-time, using activity data, related tasks, appointments and other known information to personalise the chat and improve customer experience.... all without leaving WhatsApp or exporting identifiable information to a private contacts book, keeping company data protected.

With ğ—”ğ˜‚ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ—¦ğ˜†ğ—»ğ—°, communications are logged directly to the Activity Log in Reapit - either on command or every few hours - as a journal entry in the selected contact record (tenant, applicant, property, etc).

With ğ—£ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ—»ğ—°ğ—² ğ——ğ—®ğ˜€ğ—µğ—¯ğ—¼ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—±, managers get a comprehensive overview of the teamâ€™s interactions and metrics in a customisable data centre, offering business intelligence on WhatsApp use that was previously unknown.

More productive, more transparent, more efficient.

And less email.

Thatâ€™s SalesRook.

âœ…  Increase revenues and do more deals by speeding up interactions & decisions. WhatsApp is 25x faster than email and boasts a 98% open rate - give your agents the tools to be able to use it legitimately and move important conversations along at speed.

âœ…  For your agents who don't write notes in Reapit, you'll gain full transparency of their conversations with customers. This carries positive customer service & revenue implications, especially when an agent is off sick or leaves the business.

âœ…  For agents who do make good notes on Reapit, they will no longer need to and will save lots of time - 25 minutes a day on average; the equivalent of 2.68 40-hour work weeks / year.

âœ…  Agents will continue to use their own, individual WhatsApp number meaning they can offer a human-to-human service as themselves (instead of as the brand), allowing the business to maintain its culture of high-quality personal relationships.

âœ…  SalesRook Negotiator is a mobile-friendly solution - SalesRook will sync messages sent or received on mobile into Reapit when the agent returns to the office.

âœ…  Prevent known GDPR and AML risks that you'd prefer to be compliant with. Keeping accurate records whilst working in WhatsApp Business allows you to stay onside.

Once you install the Extension we request the following permissions:

ğŸ›¡  "storage" - Allows us to store, retrieve, and track changes to user data. We store your SalesRook user profile information (name, phone number, and email) to use when performing operations within the extension. For authentication, we store session-based authentication tokens from SalesRook and Reapit.
ğŸ›¡  "tabs" - Allows us to access to manage the extension's tabs for relevant operations. We use this to operate almost everything SalesRook enables you to do. We only use this permission on the specific and relevant websites.
ğŸ›¡  "host permission" - Allows us to use Match Patterns to make sure our extension loads when the WhatsApp Web page loads in the browser and retrieve your SalesRook user access token for further authentication
ğŸ›¡ You will be asked to connect with your Reapit user
ğŸ›¡ You will be asked to provide your Reapit username for login validation
ğŸ›¡ SalesRook does not store any company content, contacts or customer data
 
For further information, please review our privacy policy (https://get.salesrook.com/privacy-policy) and terms of use (https://get.salesrook.com/service-terms-conditions)
 
For any questions/concerns, please contact us on support@salesrook.com
